DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( volunteer know name treatment assign ) single-center study canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) warfarin healthy adult volunteer . Canagliflozin drug currently development low blood sugar level patient type 2 diabetes mellitus warfarin approve anticoagulant ( ie , drug stop blood clot ) . After overnight fast ( without eat food ) least 10 hour , volunteer receive Sequence 1 ( canagliflozin 300 mg , orally , daily Days 1-12 single , oral 30 mg dose warfarin Day 6 [ Treatment A ] follow 14 day later single , oral 30 mg dose warfarin Day 1 [ Treatment B ] ) OR Sequence 2 ( Treatment B follow 14 day later Treatment A ) .
